column1: Does the founder hold an advanced degree in a relevant field?
Has the founder co-founded their current company with a small team?
Has the founder previously held a leadership role in a startup?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder worked full-time at a large number of companies?
Does the founder have experience in the healthcare or biotechnology sectors?
Has the founder received moderate press coverage?
Did the founder start their current company alone?
Does the founder have military work experience?
